data: The thread Sprint Retro Discussion discusses retrospective feedback on the recent sprint.
The thread Sprint Retro Discussion includes a request for thoughts on what went well and what needs improvement in the sprint.
The thread Sprint Retro Discussion includes feedback that team communication was effective during the sprint.
The thread Sprint Retro Discussion includes feedback that API blocker delays occurred during the sprint.
The thread Sprint Retro Discussion includes a proposal to allocate more time for API development in the next sprint to address blocker delays.
